definitions.definition: (interrogative) What person or people; which person or people.
(relative) Used to refer to a previously mentioned person or people.
definitions.example: He's a person with whom I work. (defining)

definitions.definition: (fused relative, archaic outside set patterns) The person(s) whom; whomever.
definitions.example: To whom it may concern, all business of John Smith Ltd. has now been transferred to Floggitt & Runne.
